column4: if my current maverick version is 32-bit, and I'm installing 64-bit natty, will it read my /home? (I have a separate /home partition)
you'll have to remap the home directory in afterwards
gaara: sure I will, but is there a 32-bit / 64-bit move problem?
i would say only if you have 32bit custom programs residing in it, you may need to recompile them
